titleStmt.title: The life and death of Rosamond, King Henry the Seconds concubine And how she was poysoned to death by Queen Elenor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: Dates of publication suggested by Wing.
Copy has annotation at foot of title page: Bought at Oxon. 1684.; with print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
